short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ένα browser extension για τον εξευγενισμό ιστοσελίδων (https://sarantakos.wordpress.com/2021/05/27/but/)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The purpose of the extension is to slightly modify the spelling of some words in Greek webpages with a comical effect (https://sarantakos.wordpress.com/2021/05/27/but/).
